summary: At the 2022 Academy Awards, actor Will Smith hit comedian Chris Rock after Rock made a joke about Smith's wife, Jada Pinkett Smith's hair. This was because Pinkett Smith has alopecia, a condition that causes hair loss. Smith later won an award but only apologized to the Academy, not to Rock. The next day, he said sorry to Rock and the Academy. Smith was banned from Academy events for 10 years. The moment went viral online, with international footage getting lots of views. It became the main story of the awards show.
